DOC.brief_summary: The objective protocol : 1. confirm inhibitory effect Nasaleze immediate response nasal challenge antigen , 2. show inhibition immediate response nasal challenge antigen Nasaleze inhibit subsequent inflammatory event .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Nasaleze Nasal Challenge With Allergen
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . Males females 18 45 year age . 2 . History grass and/or ragweed allergic rhinitis . 3 . Positive skin test grass and/or ragweed antigen . 4 . Positive response screen nasal challenge . 1 . Physical sign symptom suggestive renal , hepatic cardiovascular disease . 2 . Pregnant lactating woman . 3 . Upper respiratory infection within 14 day study start . 4 . FEV1 < 80 % predict screening subject history mild asthma .
